attributes.action: not sign a declaration of intent on the EU constitution which he intends to sign next month (March 25-2007)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We petition the Prime minister not to sign a declaration of intent on the EU constitution which he intends to sign next month (March 25-2007)which will pave the way for elements of the constitution, rejected by voters in France and the Netherlands and not debated or approved by the British public. 
 
This would be undemocratic as no referendum has been sought, yet the British public were promised that should the constitution ever be revived, the British public would be allowed the democratic right to vote. We therefore ask that a referendum be sought before any inclusion of any of the clauses contained within the constitution.
